project_abstract.cdata: The Industrial Free Zone Development Project will assist the Government to meet term financing expansion needs of private operating industrial free zones and the initial construction phase of new zones. The project will also strengthen the monitoring and control of environmental impact of free zones. To achieve these goals the project will finance: (i) the construction of factory shells and office park structures; and (ii) the development of new land, including infrastructure and services. The technical assistance component will aid the executing agency, the Investment Fund for Economic Development (FIDE), to implement the project; strengthen the National Council of Free Zones (NCFZ) in regulating all free zones; and support the Investment Promotion Council (IPC) in carrying out policy studies and reinforcing backward linkages.
